manufacturer.name: Gretsch
manufacturer.notes: Founded by Friedrich Gretsch in Brooklyn, New York.

model.name: G5420T Electromatic Hollow Body Single-Cut with Bigsby
model.description: The G5420T Electromatic Hollow Body Single-Cut with Bigsby features a laminated maple body with vintage-inspired contours and refined arches, as well as trestle block bracing to help reduce unwanted feedback.

specifications.electronics_description: Volume 1 (Neck), Volume 2 (Bridge), Master Volume, Master Tone
